extDescription.message: Browser extension that intercepts IDE hyperlinks (vscode://, cursor://, windsurf://) and lets you choose which IDE to open them with

menuSelectIde.description: Context menu title for IDE selection

menuInstallVsix.description: Context menu title for VSIX installation

warningNotInstalled.message: No reaction if program is not installed

notificationVsixDownloaded.description: Notification title when VSIX is downloaded

notificationVsixInstallHint.message: Use "$IDE_NAME$ --install-extension <path>" or drag into Extensions view.

notificationInstalledTo.description: Text between extension ID and IDE name in success notification
